recipeDescriptionLines.recipeDescriptionLine: Sugarcane juice widely known as ganne ka ras is one of the best juice that can quench your thirst during summer. This chilled juice is the best energy drink for hot weather which is loaded with potassium, carbohydrate, iron, protein and other essential nutrients.
Sugarcane has many health benefits. It helps in digestion, strengthen liver, help in proper kidney function and good for your skin.

preface: Every time my family went to the sugarcane juice shop, it was closed. Seeing the sugarcane in the supermarket it made our cravings for juice stronger. We couldn't wait any longer and decided to make it at home.

procedureSteps.stepDescription: Wipe the sugarcane clean with a damp cloth. Using a sharp knife, carefully cut it into small pieces. This is the most exhaustive step.
Grind all the ingredients together. Strain the juice. Keep it in the refrigerator for 30 mins or just add an ice cube and serve it right away.

tips.tipDesc: Make sure to use a powerful mixer, otherwise grinding sugarcane may spoil it.
Be really careful while chopping sugarcane to avoid yourself getting hurt.
